CSS Grid Jan Tschichold Quote

Inspired by Jen Simmons

This css grid design was inspired by Jen Simmons' video titled "CSS Grid like you are Jan Tschichold." I am a huge fan of Jen's work, and this was a great project to practice working with CSS grid. This design is fully responsive and took approximately 4 hours from initial concept to finished code. (Yes, it's desktop first. Don't @ me.)

See the Pen CSS Grid Tschichold Quote by Alyson Sherrard (@ux_unicorn) on CodePen.
